mapper.insert: insert into users(id, pw, name, nickName, role, addr, email, tel, birth, gender, preferPace, status) values(#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{nickName}, #{role}, #{addr}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{preferPace}, #{status})
mapper.select: select * from users where id = #{param1} and pw = #{param2}
select count(*) from users where id = #{param1}
mapper.update: update users set nickName = #{nickName}, email = #{email}, tel = #{tel}, addr = #{addr}, preferPace = #{preferPace} where no = #{no}
